name: Santa Claus Christmas Snow Racing Full
name_original: Santa Claus Christmas Snow Racing Full
description:
Nice children from all over the world are waiting for gift – and naughty children are waiting for punishment! Only the fastest Santa can deliver it all at one night! Join the Christmas Racing and become the best with Santa Claus Christmas Snow Racing!
Let’s start the race! Join these funny unusual racing contest, choose your Santa, feed your reindeer and start the ride! Earn points to raise up characteristics of your deer or Santa Claus, unlock new tracks and sleds!
Enjoy the snowy wind and be ready to deliver all gifts on time! Do your best, ride as fast as you can, achieve the best result and collect all awards! Show these Santa parodies who is the best friend of each human child!
Choose the best and the fastest Santa Claus in the whole world with Santa Claus Christmas Snow Racing!
Santa Claus Christmas Snow Racing features:
Unusual Christmas racing – Santa Claus sled ride!
Different Santas as your racer
Unlockable tracks, sleighs and reindeer
Amazing graphics
Choose the best Santa Claus in the whole world!
Different Santas from all over the world gathered together to determine the best one! Find out the fastest sledge racer and have fun with Christmas Santa Snow Racing!
